abstract: As Google continues its shopping spree, the search giant has picked up Plink, the maker of an android application that can recognize and identify artwork, The Guardian reported.
snippet: As Google continues its shopping spree, the search giant has picked up Plink, the maker of an android application that can recognize and identify artwork, The Guardian reported.
lead_paragraph: As Google continues its shopping spree, the search giant has picked up Plink, the maker of an Android application that can recognize and identify artwork, The Guardian reported.
